meanings.sent1: The operagoers were excited to see the new opera at the theater.
meanings.sent2: Many operagoers dressed elegantly for the opera night.
meanings.sent3: The operagoers chuckled as they watched the comedic opera performance.
meanings.sent4: The operagoers were like bees buzzing around the opera house, eager for the show to start.
meanings.sent5: The operagoers filled the theater with their anticipation and love for opera.
